andromeda.why: Early vigilance about what to say/do now is self-governance, not liberation/rescue.

arcturus.why: Sets a clean timing container—observe, pace, then act/speak in the present.

draco.why: ‘Correct’ immediacy can become status policing of what’s said/done now.

lyra.why: When the moment is right, the delivery has crisp, compelling presence.

orion-dark.why: Forcing pronouncements to control the room instead of waiting for clarity.

orion-light.why: Micro-ordeal of restraint: only act/speak when the moment is true.

pleiades.why: Attunes to audience safety so presence can land without friction.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching: personal timing hygiene, not transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Refuses pressure to perform on command; guards sovereign timing.

arcturus.why: Composure and pacing: stabilize the field before speaking/acting.

draco.why: Gatekeeping who ‘gets’ to speak now under stress.

lyra.why: Quiet poise gives the moment a graceful shape.

orion-dark.why: Hiding behind procedure to avoid authentic immediacy.

orion-light.why: Honorable restraint: wait until the now is clear, then move.

pleiades.why: Mood/audience attunement ensures the moment is receivable.

sirius.why: Beginnings of presence pedagogy—others learn by your timing.

andromeda.why: Trial-and-error with immediacy is self-mastery, not rescue.

arcturus.why: Timing dysregulation: blurting or freezing under visibility.

draco.why: Defensive posturing—use of ‘now’ statements to assert rank.

lyra.why: Expressive flair emerges when the moment truly opens.

orion-dark.why: Formulaic slogans to control the crowd instead of authentic presence.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of presence: own mistakes, refine immediacy, try again.

pleiades.why: People-pleasing timing bends presence out of truth.

sirius.why: Self-forging presence; not yet a teaching channel.

andromeda.why: Champions sovereignty of timing in groups—no coerced urgency.

arcturus.why: Converts immediacy into usable protocol: when/how to act in the now.

draco.why: Presence success can attract access/voice gatekeeping.

lyra.why: Clear, charismatic delivery that carries the moment cleanly.

orion-dark.why: Risk of canonizing ‘the way’ to be present (orthodoxy).

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-steadiness: others meet the ordeal of real-time integrity.

pleiades.why: Relational pacing makes the protocol welcome, not harsh.

sirius.why: Presence-as-teaching: the method of now is transmitted by example.

andromeda.why: Refuses coercive narratives; protects sovereign pace under projection.

arcturus.why: Cast as ‘fix the room now’ → burnout/scapegoat when nuance is needed.

draco.why: Authority aura invites loyalty tests over who may speak/act now.

lyra.why: Iconic poise—visible signal of clean immediacy.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine capture: enforcing ‘proper’ presence to preserve control.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—choose the true moment over applause.

pleiades.why: Appeasement distorts timing and truth of the moment.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: demonstrates ethical immediacy despite pressure.

andromeda.why: Embodied sovereignty frees others from time-pressure domination.

arcturus.why: Elder pacing: durable standards for acting/speaking only when true.

draco.why: Legacy status can drift into gatekeeping of ‘real presence.’

lyra.why: Role-model elegance—presence has effortless style without vanity.

orion-dark.why: Turning timing into dogma/hierarchy instead of living practice.

orion-light.why: Elder ordeal: courage and humility to serve truth in the moment.

pleiades.why: Focus is standards of presence, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Presence sage—teaches the law of the Now through embodied example.
